name: Full Stack Developer Roadmap Plugin
description: Comprehensive Full Stack Development learning and project management plugin with 7 specialized agents covering frontend, backend, databases, DevOps, architecture, testing, and security.
author: Claude Code Marketplace

agents.name: Frontend Development Agent
agents.description: Expert in modern frontend technologies including React, Vue, Angular, Next.js, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and responsive design.

agents.name: Backend Development Agent
agents.description: Specializes in server-side development with Node.js, Express, Python, Java, RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and microservices architecture.

agents.name: Database & Data Structures Agent
agents.description: Expert in SQL databases, NoSQL solutions, Redis caching, data modeling, query optimization, and big data concepts.

agents.name: DevOps & Infrastructure Agent
agents.description: Specializes in Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines, cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure), monitoring, and infrastructure automation.

agents.name: System Design & Architecture Agent
agents.description: Expert in system architecture, design patterns, scalability, high availability, and enterprise-level solution design.

agents.name: Testing & Quality Assurance Agent
agents.description: Covers unit testing, integration testing, E2E testing, performance testing, test automation, and quality metrics.

agents.name: Security & Best Practices Agent
agents.description: Focuses on application security, authentication, authorization, data protection, compliance, and security best practices.

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Start a personalized learning path for Full Stack Development

commands.name: roadmap
commands.description: View complete Full Stack Developer roadmap with interactive learning paths

commands.name: project
commands.description: Browse and start hands-on projects categorized by skill level

commands.name: assess
commands.description: Evaluate your skills and get personalized recommendations
